front.title: Third-Party ALTO Server Discovery Prototype Implementation and Testbed

abstract.t: This document contains a prototype implementation for the third-party ALTO server discovery (3pdisc) procedure specified in draft-kist-alto-3pdisc-02.txt [I-D.kist-alto-3pdisc]. The prototype implementation has been written in Perl and tested with the GNU/Linux operating system. A set of BIND 9 configuration files and DNS zone files is also included. They can be used for setting up a small, self-contained testbed.
